mcq.statement: What was the main objective of Operation Rah-e-Nijat conducted in 2009 by the Pakistan armed forces?

options.c: To target TTP and their allies in South Waziristan

mcq.one_liner: Operation Rah-e-Nijat in 2009 was a major military offensive by Pakistan's armed forces targeting the **Tehreek-i-Taliban Pakistan (TTP) and their extremist allies** in South Waziristan.
